        public void renderScenario​(FormatterCore formatter)
                    throws FormatterException
        Description copied from interface: RenderingScenario
        Renders the scenario into the supplied formatter.
        Specified by:
        renderScenario in interface RenderingScenario
        Parameters:
        formatter - the formatter to render into
        Throws:
        FormatterException - if rendering fails. If this exception is thrown, the supplied formatter may be in an unknown state.
